name: flu
description:
This is our game for the Global Game Jam 2019.

What does home mean to a bacterium? Live adventures through different bodies while you search for your ideal host body, unfortunately infect them.

Controls: w,a,d to move and L to shoot.

PROGRAMMING
  •  Daniel Sánchez Sánchez
  •  Javier Rodenas Jiménez
  •  Nadia Martínez Maiques
ART AND DESIGN
  •  Carlos Manuel Bea Masero
  •  Carlos Juan Navarro
  •  Carles Vicent Ginés Muñoz
SOUND
  •  Groovel Studios ( Juan "Hust" Novella y Alberto Trigueros)
